task_description:
# Implement Transition System

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-91](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-91/implement-transition-system)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Tokens, page transitions, modal animations

patterns.theme_extension: Material-UI theme extension pattern - export tokens from tokens.ts, import in theme.ts, re-export from index.ts
patterns.existing_transitions: Simple transition tokens already exist in tokens.ts (fast, normal, slow) - EXTEND these, don't replace
patterns.mui_components: Use Material-UI's built-in Transition components (Fade, Slide, Grow) from @mui/material
patterns.styled_components: Use styled() from @mui/material/styles for custom styling, Emotion for CSS-in-JS
patterns.accessibility_pattern: prefers-reduced-motion already handled globally in theme.ts (lines 79-84) - transitions will respect this automatically
patterns.component_structure: Common components go in src/components/common/, UI components in src/components/ui/

existing_implementations.description: Found existing transition tokens in tokens.ts (fast/normal/slow), global prefers-reduced-motion CSS in theme.ts, Modal component using Material-UI Dialog with StyledDialog pattern, React Router setup in App.tsx with Routes
key_insights: Transition tokens exist but are CSS strings - need to EXTEND with Material-UI compatible structure (duration in ms, easing as strings)
Global prefers-reduced-motion already set to 0.01ms in theme.ts - Material-UI transitions will respect this
Modal component uses StyledDialog pattern with styled() - can follow this for AnimatedModal
App.tsx uses React Router's Routes and Route - need to wrap Outlet or Route elements for page transitions
React Transition Group types already installed (@types/react-transition-group)

technology_constraints.animation_library: MUST use Material-UI built-in transitions (Fade, Slide, Grow) - NO Framer Motion, React Spring, or other libraries
technology_constraints.performance: Use ONLY GPU-accelerated properties (transform, opacity) - max 300ms duration
technology_constraints.accessibility: Must respect prefers-reduced-motion - already handled globally in theme
